purpose: Refactor the NextJS 14+ codebase to enhance code structure and reduce redundancy, following best practices.

instructions.instruction: Modify files as needed: create, delete, or update.
Analyze the code in the section and propose an optimized file structure.
Improve modularity by breaking down long components and functions. Create reusable utility functions, components, and theme.
Provide code for each new or updated file in a single block.
Only include the updated parts of the code in your response.
Remove outdated or unused files, components, functions, and dependencies. Explain each removal.
Respect the currently used libraries to avoid introducing unnecessary dependencies.
Maintain the existing file names unless a change is necessary for better clarity or structure.
Ensure that after applying all changes, the code remains fully functional.

output_format: path/to/file create | update | delete Description of changes and purpose. Updated parts of the code
